title: 820 4924 - No backlight
message:
hello, 

Working on 820 4924 with no backlight! i have found C7773 shorted and F7700 broken! 

Already replace the driver U7700 but same history! 

i noticed on pin1 PPVOUT_S0_BKLT = 12.3V and i have the 5.1V on L8300 when start! 

an suggestion ? thanks

title: 820 4924 - No backlight
message:
Any history available, liquid sign?
Did you try known good compatible screen assembly?

Be sure D7710 is not shorted.
You can also try new U7700.
